items.caption: XCOV19 helps ill patients find hospitals and assess symptoms
items.dropdown: As of July 13, India’s total for coronavirus Cases topped 878,000, including 23,000 deaths.

items.caption: XCOV19 requests patient data and completes pre-assessment in tandem with the HMS
items.dropdown: 4,300 Indians die every day due to lack of access to poor quality of healthcare.

items.caption: Patient arrives at the hospital
items.dropdown: Government spending on healthcare falls below ₹2,000 per person, highlighting a need for technology efficiency and lean process.

items.caption: Hospital admits patient in hassle-free process
items.dropdown: In Mumbai, 99% of intensive care beds were full in July. Delhi needs 10 times the current available amount of expected cases.
